text: National Chiao Tung University (NCTU; ) is a university in Taiwan. It was founded in 1896 (currently Shanghai Jiao Tong University). It moved to Taipei City in 1958. It moved to Hsinchu City in 1979. NCTU is one of the four universities of the University System of Taiwan. ==Other websites== *NCTU C Category:1896 establishments in Asia Category:Establishments in Taiwan
title: National Chiao Tung University
